fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- Roleblock your target.
- (Rehearsal) Roleblock all visitors to your target, then Rehearse.
- (Concert) Roleblock everyone who visits you or your target, then attack all of them in the same way that they would have been attacked in a coldsnap.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
**- Rehearsal Radius: 3**
- Roleblock immune.
- (Concert) Only players you directly roleblock will be attacked.
